OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
14 GREGORY HALL

February 26, 1958
Dr. Sam L. Becker, Director
Division of Television, Radio^Film

Television Center
609 10th Avenue
Coralville, Iowa
Dear Sams
Attached is copy of letter received today from Ken Kager regarding his
Research Grant-in-aid. Since he indicates willingness to keep in touch with
the Committee, I thought you might be interested in seeing. I*m sending a
copy of his letter and mine also to Ken Harwood.
Sincerely,
harry J. sxarnia
Executive Director
HJS/dfc
